summary.Title: Logistics Coordinator
summary.Presentation: Are you passionate about logistics and thrive in a fast-paced environment? Sahota ApS is seeking a dedicated Logistics Coordinator to join our dynamic team. If you enjoy solvi

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you passionate about logistics and thrive in a fast-paced environment? Sahota ApS is seeking a dedicated Logistics Coordinator to join our dynamic team. If you enjoy solving challenges, managing supply chains, and ensuring smooth operations, this role is perfect for you!

Key Responsibilities:
  • Plan and coordinate transportation schedules to ensure timely deliveries.
  • Monitor and optimize supply chain processes to minimize costs and increase efficiency.
  • Communicate with clients, suppliers, and drivers to maintain excellent service standards.
  • Prepare and manage shipping documents, including invoices and customs declarations.
  • Use logistics software to track shipments and analyze data to improve performance.
  • Address and resolve any logistical issues or discrepancies that arise.
  • Collaborate with other departments to ensure seamless integration of logistics with company operations.
Qualifications:
  • Proven experience in logistics, transportation, or supply chain management.
  • Strong organizational and multitasking skills.
  • Proficiency in logistics management software and tools.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
  • Knowledge of relevant regulations and compliance standards.
  • Fluent in English (additional languages are a plus such as punjabi and hindi).
What We Offer:
  • A dynamic and supportive work environment.
  • Opportunities for professional growth and development.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • The chance to be part of a company that values innovation and efficiency.
How to Apply:

Send your CV and a cover letter to job@vejnetil.dk with the subject line "Logistics Coordinator Application – Sahota ApS." Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis, so apply early to ensure consideration.

Join us at Sahota ApS CVR: 33639481, and play a key role in driving our logistics operations to new heights. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!
